experience.title: Experience
experience.description: With a proven track record of success in software development and team collaboration, I bring a wealth of experience to every project. My background includes working on diverse technologies, implementing efficient solutions, and driving innovation in fast-paced environments. From conceptualizing ideas to delivering robust systems, I consistently strive to exceed expectations and contribute to meaningful outcomes.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
I'm currently a software developer, freelancer, and instructor, constantly learning new things and building projects with amazing people.
I am also embarking on an exciting journey as a software developer and freelancer, collaborating with multiple companies and startups, while teaching people worldwide.


I enjoy bridging the gap between programming and design, combining my technical expertise with a keen eye for aesthetics to craft beautiful, functional products.
My goal is to build applications that are scalable and efficient behind the scenes, while delivering engaging and accessible user experiences.


Fast-forward to today, I've had the privilege of working with a global IT startup, Incedo, and contributing to innovative projects at a tech startup.
Currently, my primary focus is on creating accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for a diverse range of clients at an advertising agency.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I have a strong interest in exploring the intersection of web development and innovative strategies. I enjoy collaborating with teams that embrace agile methodologies to deliver impactful solutions swiftly and effectively. Outside of work, I stay updated on emerging technologies and actively contribute to open-source communities.

education.title: education
education.description: I earned a degree in Computer Science with a strong focus on mathematics and programming. My background has equipped me with strong skills in algorithms, software development, and problem-solving. I stay current with technological advancements and apply my education to contribute effectively to innovative projects and collaborative teams.

files.university: Higher Institute of Informatics and Mathematics of Monastir

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description: In my free time, I enjoy playing Valorant, a tactical first-person shooter that sharpens my strategic thinking and teamwork skills. Itâ€™s a great way to unwind while staying mentally engaged. Balancing gaming with my professional life helps me recharge and maintain a healthy work-life balance.

1.title: Aermax
1.description: The Aermax project, for an industrial climbers company located in Germany, is an extensive endeavor focused on creating a robust and scalable platform by integrating both existing and newly developed microservices.

2.title: Incedo Lead Generator
2.description: I contributed to the project The Incedo Lead Generator, an innovative platform that enables precise targeting of your clearly defined target group. Whether in recruiting to find the right candidates or in sales to generate promising leads, through intelligent automation,

3.title: Triqbriq/RentClean/Leutron
3.description: I contributed to the development of customizations for the Haufe X360 platform, tailoring it to our clients' needs. These enhancements streamlined workflows, automated tasks, and integrated features to improve their daily ERP processes

4.title: react-crafitify
4.description: React-Crafitify is a versatile React component library designed to enhance the user interface of your web applications. With a focus on aesthetics and usability, React-Crafitify provides a collection of customizable UI components that can seamlessly integrate into your projects..
